item.title: 耐克和其他零售商股票因特朗普与越南达成降低关税的贸易协议而上涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示已与越南达成贸易协议，将对来自东南亚国家的许多进口商品征收低于最初预期的关税后，耐克和其他服装制造商的股票周三上涨。【原文：Shares of Nike and other apparel makers rose on Wednesday after U.S. President Donald Trump said he had struck a trade deal with Vietnam that would impose a lower than initially expected tariff rate on many imports from the Southeast Asian country.】

item.title: 俄罗斯储蓄银行首席执行官对俄罗斯推动创建数字卢布感到困惑
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的银行储蓄银行（Sberbank）首席执行官格尔曼-格莱夫（German Gref）周三表示，除了跨境结算可能出现的例外情况外，他看不到俄罗斯发展数字卢布的任何潜在好处。【原文：German Gref, CEO of Russia's dominant lender Sberbank , on Wednesday said he did not see any potential benefits to Russia's development of the digital rouble beyond the possible exception of cross-border settlements.】

item.title: 第二季度石油期货和期权交易量创历史新高，投资者把握波动趋势
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战，中东地缘政治冲突升级，洲际交易所（ICE）第二季度石油期货和期权交易总量创下历史新高。【原文：Total oil futures and options lots traded on the Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) hit record highs in the second quarter, as U.S. President Donald Trump waged a trade war and geopolitical conflicts in the Middle East escalated.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，美国数以千计的用户无法使用 Meta's Instagram
item.description: 据断电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，周三，美国有数千名用户的 Meta Platforms Instagram 出现故障。【原文：Meta Platforms' Instagram was down for thousands of users in the U.S. on Wednesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 世卫组织推动各国将含糖饮料、酒精和烟草的价格提高 50
item.description: 世界卫生组织正在推动各国在未来 10 年内通过征税将含糖饮料、酒精和烟草的价格提高 50%，这是对征税帮助解决慢性公共卫生问题的最有力支持。【原文：The World Health Organization is pushing countries to raise the prices of sugary drinks, alcohol and tobacco by 50% over the next 10 years through taxation, its strongest backing yet for taxes to help tackle chronic public health problems.】

item.title: 欧盟利用私人资金推动量子技术发展
item.description: 欧盟技术负责人亨娜-维尔库宁（Henna Virkkunen）周三表示，欧盟正在寻求吸引私人资金，以帮助欧盟到2030年在量子技术领域占据领先地位，因为欧盟正努力减少在该领域对美国和中国的依赖。【原文：The European Union is seeking to attract private funding to help it take the lead in quantum technology by 2030, EU tech chief Henna Virkkunen said on Wednesday, as the bloc works to cut its reliance in the sector on the United States and China.】

item.title: 乔治-阿玛尼（Giorgio Armani）2024 年业绩艰难，核心利润下降 24%，加大投资力度
item.description: 意大利时装品牌乔治-阿玛尼（Giorgio Armani）周三表示，受收入下降和运营成本略有增加的影响，公司去年的核心利润下降了 24%。【原文：Italian fashion house Giorgio Armani said on Wednesday its core profit dropped 24% last year hit by declining revenues and a slight increase in operating costs.】

item.title: 特朗普税收和支出巨额法案的主要内容
item.description: 共和党控制的国会可能很快就会最终批准一项全面的税收和支出法案，该法案包含了唐纳德-特朗普总统的许多国内优先事项。【原文：The Republican-controlled Congress could soon give final approval to a sweeping tax and spending bill that incorporates many of President Donald Trump's top domestic priorities.】

item.title: 通用动力公司获得价值 18.5 亿美元的潜艇生产修改合同
item.description: 通用动力公司（General Dynamics）的潜艇制造部门--通用动力电船公司（General Dynamics Electric Boat）周三表示，它收到了一份价值 18.5 亿美元的修改合同，该合同是对其之前获得的弗吉尼亚级潜艇合同的修改。【原文：General Dynamics Electric Boat, the submarine making unit of General Dynamics , said on Wednesday it received a $1.85 billion modification on its previously awarded contract for Virginia-class submarines.】

item.title: 民主党联邦通信委员会委员抨击派拉蒙与特朗普的和解是 "无奈之举
item.description: 联邦通信委员会的一位民主党人称，派拉蒙公司为解决美国总统唐纳德-特朗普就哥伦比亚广播公司新闻频道《60 分钟》节目播出的对手卡马拉-哈里斯的采访而提起的诉讼，以 1600 万美元达成和解，是确保合并获得批准的 "无奈之举"。【原文：A Democrat on the Federal Communications Commission called Paramount's $16 million settlement to resolve a lawsuit filed by U.S. President Donald Trump over a CBS News' 60 Minutes interview broadcast with rival Kamala Harris "a desperate move" to secure approval of a merger.】

item.title: 以色列希望在与伊朗开战后获得潜在的经济 "和平红利
item.description: 以色列上个月与伊朗爆发了为期 12 天的战争，使其经济受到重创，但投资者和以色列人都希望，在美国斡旋下停止敌对行动能给以色列与邻国带来几十年来梦寐以求的经济 "和平红利"。【原文：Israel's 12-day war with Iran last month has dented its economy but investors and Israelis are hopeful that a U.S.-brokered halt to hostilities could bring an economic "peace dividend" with the country's neighbours that has been a dream for decades.】

item.title: 印度法院允许 Crocs 对侵权提出质疑
item.description: 印度一家法院恢复了 Crocs Inc 长达九年之久的诉讼，该诉讼指控几家印度公司推出了与其流行的橡胶木屐相同的鞋类产品，从而允许这家美国公司继续进行侵权挑战。【原文：An Indian court has revived nine-year-old lawsuits filed by Crocs Inc which accused several Indian companies of launching footwear identical to its popular rubber clogs, allowing the U.S. firm to press ahead with its infringement challenges.】

item.title: 达拉斯联储调查显示，2025 年第二季度石油和天然气活动略有收缩
item.description: 达拉斯联储周三的调查显示，2025 年第二季度美国得克萨斯州、路易斯安那州和新墨西哥州的石油和天然气行业活动略有萎缩。【原文：Activity in the U.S. oil and gas sector in Texas, Louisiana and New Mexico contracted slightly in the second quarter of 2025, the Dallas Fed survey showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国天然气价格上涨超过 2%，原因是预计 7 月中旬天气炎热，制冷需求增加
item.description: 美国天然气期货周三上涨超过 2%，结束了连续两日的跌势，原因是 7 月中旬的高温天气预报预计将在未来两周内提升空调需求，促使发电企业燃烧更多天然气。【原文：U.S. natural gas futures rose more than 2% on Wednesday, snapping a two-day losing streak, as hotter mid-July forecasts are expected to lift demand for air conditioning over the next two weeks, prompting power generators to burn more gas.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国已与越南达成贸易协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，他已经与越南达成了一项贸易协议，并将在稍后公布细节。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday that he has struck a trade deal with Vietnam and would announce details later.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，数以千计的美国用户无法使用马斯克的 X 系统
item.description: 据停电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，埃隆-马斯克的 X 系统周三在美国有数千用户停机。【原文：Elon Musk's X was down for thousands of users in the U.S. on Wednesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 小米首席执行官表示，小米将考虑从 2027 年起在中国以外地区销售汽车
item.description: 中国小米公司首席执行官雷军在周三的一次直播中表示，从 2027 年起，这家从智能手机制造商转型为电动汽车制造商的公司将考虑在中国境外销售汽车。【原文：China's Xiaomi will consider selling cars outside China from 2027, Lei Jun, CEO of the smartphone turned electric vehicle maker, said during a livestream on Wednesday.】

item.title: 洞察：延误喷气式飞机交付的航空座椅行业危机内幕
item.description: 威尔士一家工厂的豪华商务舱座椅扶手下藏着一条线索，它揭示了全球航空业的瓶颈，许多航空公司正焦急地等待新喷气式飞机。【原文：Tucked beneath the armrest of a luxury business class seat in a factory in Wales lies a clue to a global aviation bottleneck that has left many airlines waiting impatiently for new jets.】

item.title: 比亚迪越野品牌方成宝为华为辅助驾驶系统提供优惠
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪旗下的方成宝品牌周三在社交媒体上发文称，华为乾坤高级驾驶系统套餐限时优惠20,000元（2,790.33美元）。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD's Fangchengbao brand is offering a limited-time 20,000 yuan ($2,790.33) discount for the Huawei Qiankun Advanced Driving System package, Fangchengbao said in a social media post on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉季度交付量大幅下降，超过分析师预期
item.description: 特斯拉周三报告称，由于激烈的竞争和首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的政治立场遭到反弹，其老化的电动汽车产品线的全球需求受到打击，第二季度交付量大幅下降，降幅超过预期。【原文：Tesla reported a sharper-than-expected fall in second-quarter deliveries on Wednesday, as intense competition and backlash against CEO Elon Musk's political stance hit global demand for its aging electric-vehicle lineup.】

item.title: 据《西雅图时报》报道，微软将裁员多达 9000 人
item.description: 据《西雅图时报》周三报道，微软将裁员多达 4%，约 9100 人，这是自 2023 年以来最大规模的一轮裁员。【原文：Microsoft is laying off as much as 4%, or roughly 9,100, of its employees in the largest round of job cuts since 2023, the Seattle Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，谷歌为避免欧盟反垄断罚款提出新建议
item.description: 据路透社看到的一份文件显示，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司已提议对其搜索结果进行新的修改，以抵御来自竞争对手越来越多的批评。【原文：Alphabet's Google has proposed fresh changes to its search results in an attempt to fend off growing criticism from rivals, a week before a key meeting that could lead to yet another EU antitrust fine, according to a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 印度 Max Financial 公司报告其部门受到网络威胁
item.description: 印度 Max Financial Services 公司周三表示，其子公司 Axis Max Life Insurance 收到了匿名发件人关于未经授权访问客户数据的通信。【原文：India's Max Financial Services said on Wednesday its unit, Axis Max Life Insurance, received communication on unauthorized access to customer data from an anonymous sender.】

item.title: 美国利率期货提高 7 月宽松押注，9 月全面降价
item.description: 周三的联邦基金利率期货提高了在 7 月份的政策会议上降息的可能性，因为 6 月份的私营部门就业报告远远低于预期。【原文：Futures on the federal funds rate on Wednesday lifted the chances of a rate cut by the July policy meting after a much weaker-than-expected private sector jobs report for June.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，以帕尔默-卢基为首的科技富豪将创办新银行，与 SVB 竞争
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，由 Anduril 联合创始人帕尔默-卢基（Palmer Luckey）领导的一群科技亿万富翁正在发起一家新的以加密货币为重点的美国银行，以填补硅谷银行倒闭后留下的空白。【原文：A group of tech billionaires led by Anduril co-founder Palmer Luckey are launching a new crypto-focused U.S. bank to fill the void left by Silicon Valley Bank's collapse, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 关税打击需求，Rivian 公布季度交付量下降 22
item.description: Rivian Automotive 周三报告称，由于激烈的竞争和关税导致的经济不确定性，其电动汽车的需求受到打击，第二季度交付量大幅下降。【原文：Rivian Automotive reported a sharp fall in second-quarter deliveries on Wednesday, as demand for its electric vehicles takes a hit from stiff competition and tariff-driven economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 美国冻结加征关税到期后墨西哥比索将下滑
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，在美国对其他国家加征关税的临时冻结措施于下周到期后，反弹的墨西哥比索将在未来几个月内下滑。【原文：The rallying Mexican peso is set to slip in the coming months after a temporary freeze on U.S. tariff hikes against other countries expires next week, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 美国 6 月私营部门就业人数意外减少；裁员人数仍然较少
item.description: 本周三发布的《ADP全国就业报告》显示，6月份美国私营企业就业人数意外下降，上个月的就业增幅也小于最初的预期。【原文：U.S. private payrolls unexpectedly fell in June and job gains in the prior month were smaller than initially thought, the ADP National Employment Report showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 去美元化迹象显现，新兴市场债务销售激增不惧全球动荡
item.description: 银行家们告诉路透社，今年上半年，新兴市场的债务销售蓬勃发展，无视关税发脾气、导弹袭击和油价波动，有望再创新高--而且有迹象表明，新兴市场正在摆脱美元的影响。【原文：Emerging market debt sales boomed in the first half of the year, defying tariff tantrums, missile attacks and gyrating oil prices, on track for another year of records - and with nascent signs of a shift away from the dollar, bankers told Reuters.】

item.title: 马士基估计目前美国的有效关税平均为 21
item.description: 丹麦航运集团马士基公司周三表示，该公司估计其实际支付的美国进口关税平均为集装箱装载量的21%，不到华盛顿4月份暂停征收全面关税前的一半。【原文：Maersk estimates companies pay effective U.S. import tariffs of on average 21% relative to container load, the Danish shipping group said on Wednesday, less than half the rate before Washington paused its sweeping tariffs in April.】
